CustomField.description: Allows to set an offset. For e.g. Due Date is Engagement Confirmation Date + 7, this field stores 7. Similarly you can set a negative value too.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a positive or negative value to offset the date as mentioned in Due Date Field. For e.g. if Due Date is Date Engagement Confirmed + 7, set the value as 7
CustomField.label: Due Date Field Offset
